stories.title: Cross-check Home page against Figma design specs
stories.description: Compare components/home-sections.tsx against .ralph/figma-reference/home.tsx design specs. Check: 1) Hero section: title 'Bilby is the AI OS of government' should be Work Sans 56px tracking -3.92px color #84181f, chip says 'AI-POWERED', description box has backdrop-blur and border #ead5d6, two CTA buttons 2) Big Buttons: 3 cards (2 white 357px + 1 navy #254583 452px rounded-8px), icons should be Finance/Money/KubernetesIpAddress Streamline Carbon 3) Highlights: stats 4.3M/38+/80x/20+ in PP Fraktion Mono Thin 74px, title 'Trusted by Government Agencies...' Work Sans 44px 4) Banner: PP Fraktion Mono 18.938px uppercase 5) Content section: 3 content blocks with white cards (border #ead5d6) + 608x452 images 6) Footer: 'The Pillars' Work Sans 48px, 4 links Work Sans 24px 7) Footer nav: large Bilby logo, PP Fraktion Mono nav columns. Report all discrepancies found with specific line numbers and what needs to change. Do NOT use Figma MCP - all specs are in .ralph/figma-reference/home.tsx.
acceptance_criteria: All typography discrepancies documented with line numbers
